name: NewGenApps
description:
Founded in June 2008, NewGenApps one of the forerunners in new technology implementation. What started with Smartphone Application Development and Cloud Solutions has now diversified into Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics and AR/VR solutions as well..
At NewGenApps, we strive to continue delivering complex IT solutions and cutting-edge smartphone applications as the market evolves. With diverse IT background and strong development skills, our expert team is solely dedicated to providing the best technology solutions to our clients worldwide.
READ MORE...

locations.address: 2nd Floor, Tekarees Chambers, 17/3, Ashok Marg, Hazratganj
